issue.title: [Documentation] Add docs for Java ListVector
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11193](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11193). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Add documentation for Java [ListVector](https://arrow.apache.org/docs/java/reference/org/apache/arrow/vector/complex/ListVector.html)

Can be added to this page on Vector's - https://arrow.apache.org/docs/java/vector.html

comments.body:
